Vector Class Reference

#include <Vector.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The vector pairs an X and a Y value.

This is helpful for defining positions and sizes.

Definition at line 22 of file Vector.h.

bool constrain (  Vector  from,
Vector  to
) 
 

Constrains the vector to a given range.

The from and to parameters to not need to be ordered.

Parameters:
from One corner of the allowed range, including the value itself.
to One corner of the allowed range, including the value itself.
Returns:
Whether the vector was adjusted to lay in the range.
